panel.name: Pie Panel 1
panel.loc: Directly above HP1 (front)
panel.desc: Remaining Pie Panel numbers run counter-clockwise from this panel

panel.name: Pie Panel 2
panel.loc: Above Dome Panel 4 and Magic Panel
panel.desc: Typical location of Life Form Scanner

panel.name: Pie Panel 3
panel.loc: Above Dome Bumps and Dome Panel 7

panel.name: Pie Panel 4
panel.loc: Above HP2 (rear) and the Rear Logic Display

panel.name: Pie Panel 5
panel.loc: Above Dome Panel 9 and Dome Panel 10
panel.desc: Above the two largest dome panels

panel.name: Pie Panel 6
panel.loc: Above Front Logic Displays

panel.name: Dome Panel 1
panel.loc: Below Pie Panel 1, to the right of HP1 (front)

panel.name: Dome Panel 2
panel.loc: To the right of Dome Panel 1

panel.name: Dome Panel 3
panel.loc: To the right of Dome Panel 2

panel.name: Dome Panel 4
panel.loc: To the right of Dome Panel 3

panel.name: The Magic Panel (Dome Panel 5)
panel.loc: To the right of Dome Panel 4
panel.desc: Typically a lighting feature, not servoed

panel.name: Dome Panel 6
panel.loc: Above the Magic Panel, to the right of Dome Panel 4

panel.name: Dome Panel 7
panel.loc: To the right of Dome Panel 5

panel.name: Dome Panel 8
panel.loc: To the right of Dome Panel 7, just below the dome bumps
panel.desc: Multi-part panel, typical location of Rear PSI, not servoed

panel.name: Dome Panel 9
panel.loc: To the right of HP2 (rear)
panel.desc: Large, multi-part panel, all colored blue, not servoed

panel.name: Dome Panel 10
panel.loc: To the right of Dome Panel 9

panel.name: Dome Panel 11
panel.loc: To the left of Front Logic Displays

panel.name: Dome Panel 12
panel.loc: Front Logic Displays
panel.desc: Border around displays, colored blue, not servoed

panel.name: Dome Panel 13
panel.loc: To the right of Front Logic Displays and left of Front PSI

panel.name: Dome Panel 14
panel.loc: To the left of HP1 (front)
panel.desc: Typical location of Front PSI, not servoed
